m_szDocTitle: Patent US20100081057 - Nanocomposite of graphene and metal oxide materials - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract Nanocomposite materials comprising a metal oxide bonded to at least one graphene material. The nanocomposite materials exhibit a specific capacity of at least twice that of the metal oxide material without the graphene at a charge/discharge rate greater than about 10C.  Images(13)               Claims(37) 1. A nanocomposite material comprising a metal oxide bonded to a graphene layer. 2. The nanocomposite material of claim 1 wherein the graphene layer has a carbon to oxygen ratio of between 10 to 1 and 500 to 1. 3. The nanocomposite material of claim 1
